name: DEEper (Devastus)
description:
Description

Last time we took part in Ludum Dare (LD46), we made a game about our cat called "Dee" (Nekotchi). This time, we went DEEper AHHA AHHAHA AHAHAHA

This is an endless runner where you control the little fellow delving deeper into the phenomenon called "post-dump psychosis", strafing and jumping around, trying to dodge stuff and eat snex along the way. Didn't get as far with this as I would've hoped, but it's better than nothing innit.

Controls
  • A / Left - Strafe left
  • D / Right - Strafe right
  • W / Up / Space - Jump
  • Enter / Space - Proceed through menus (Play and Play Again)
Changelog (only in HTML5)
  • [28.04.2021] v1.1
    • Added ability to press Enter/Space in menus for faster replay
    • Made routes a bit easier and progression faster
